description.ro: Entuziasmul este o stare de activare placuta care semnaleaza anticiparea a ceva bun. Este energia care te propulseaza spre noi experiente si posibilitati.
description.en: Excitement is a pleasant state of activation signaling anticipation of something good. It is the energy that propels you toward new experiences and possibilities.

description.ro: Exaltarea este o bucurie intensa care apare cand ceva depaseste asteptarile. Este o stare de varf care celebreaza reusita si conexiunea.
description.en: Elation is intense joy that arises when something exceeds expectations. It is a peak state that celebrates achievement and connection.

description.ro: Starea de alerta este o vigilenta placuta — o claritate mentala care te face prezent si receptiv la ceea ce se intampla.
description.en: Alertness is a pleasant vigilance — a mental clarity that makes you present and receptive to what is happening.

description.ro: Entuziasmul este o pasiune activa care te energizeaza si te conecteaza cu scopul tau. Este combustibilul motivatiei intrinsece.
description.en: Enthusiasm is an active passion that energizes you and connects you with your purpose. It is the fuel of intrinsic motivation.

description.ro: Fericirea este o stare de multumire activa care semnaleaza ca lucrurile merg bine. Este o confirmare ca nevoile tale fundamentale sunt satisfacute.
description.en: Happiness is an active state of satisfaction signaling that things are going well. It is a confirmation that your fundamental needs are being met.

description.ro: Incantarea este o surpriza placuta — o bucurie spontana care apare cand ceva neasteptat si bun se intampla.
description.en: Delight is a pleasant surprise — a spontaneous joy that arises when something unexpected and good happens.

description.ro: Amuzamentul este o usurinta placuta care apare cand ceva te surprinde intr-un mod jucaus. Este un semn ca poti vedea lumea cu umor si flexibilitate.
description.en: Amusement is a pleasant lightness that arises when something surprises you in a playful way. It is a sign that you can see the world with humor and flexibility.

description.ro: Calmul este o stare de echilibru in care nu exista amenintari si corpul se relaxeaza. Este baza siguranta din care poti explora lumea.
description.en: Calm is a state of balance where there are no threats and the body relaxes. It is the safe foundation from which you can explore the world.

description.ro: Seninatatea este o pace interioara profunda — o acceptare lina a momentului prezent fara nevoia de a schimba nimic.
description.en: Serenity is a deep inner peace — a gentle acceptance of the present moment without the need to change anything.

description.ro: Relaxarea este o eliberare a tensiunii — corpul si mintea se deschid cand sistemul nervos parasimpatic preia controlul.
description.en: Relaxation is a release of tension — body and mind open when the parasympathetic nervous system takes over.

description.ro: Multumirea este o satisfactie lina — un sentiment ca ceea ce ai este suficient. Este o stare de completitudine fara dorinta de mai mult.
description.en: Contentment is a gentle satisfaction — a feeling that what you have is enough. It is a state of completeness without wanting more.

description.ro: Pacea este absenta conflictului intern — o armonie intre ceea ce simti, gandesti si faci. Este starea naturala cand nu exista amenintari.
description.en: Peace is the absence of inner conflict — a harmony between what you feel, think, and do. It is the natural state when there are no threats.

description.ro: Satisfactia este sentimentul de implinire dupa ce un efort a dat roade. Semnaleaza ca actiunile tale au avut sens.
description.en: Satisfaction is the feeling of fulfillment after effort has borne fruit. It signals that your actions had meaning.

description.ro: Tandretea este o deschidere vulnerabila catre altcineva — o caldura blanda care apare in momente de conexiune intima.
description.en: Tenderness is a vulnerable openness toward another — a gentle warmth that arises in moments of intimate connection.

description.ro: Furia este o mobilizare puternica care apare cand limitele tale sunt incalcate sau cand ceva important este amenintat. Este energia care protejeaza ceea ce contează.
description.en: Anger is a powerful mobilization that arises when your boundaries are violated or something important is threatened. It is the energy that protects what matters.

description.ro: Frica este sistemul tau de alarma — semnaleaza un pericol perceput si te pregateste sa te protejezi. Este o emotie fundamentala de supravietuire.
description.en: Fear is your alarm system — it signals a perceived danger and prepares you to protect yourself. It is a fundamental survival emotion.

description.ro: Stresul semnaleaza ca cerintele depasesc resursele percepute. Este un apel la mobilizare — corpul se pregateste pentru efort sustinut.
description.en: Stress signals that demands exceed perceived resources. It is a call to mobilize — the body prepares for sustained effort.

description.ro: Tensiunea este o stare de pregatire — corpul se contracta in anticiparea unui eveniment incert. Semnaleaza ca ceva necesita atentie.
description.en: Tension is a state of readiness — the body contracts in anticipation of an uncertain event. It signals that something needs attention.

description.ro: Nervozitatea este o anticipare anxioasa — o energie care fluctueaza intre dorinta de a actiona si teama de consecinte.
description.en: Nervousness is an anxious anticipation — an energy that fluctuates between the desire to act and the fear of consequences.

description.ro: Frustarea apare cand un obiectiv este blocat — energia de actiune nu gaseste o cale. Semnaleaza nevoia de a adapta strategia.
description.en: Frustration arises when a goal is blocked — the energy for action finds no path. It signals the need to adapt strategy.

description.ro: Tulburarea este o suferinta activa — un semnal ca ceva important este amenintat si necesita atentie imediata.
description.en: Distress is active suffering — a signal that something important is threatened and needs immediate attention.

description.ro: Tristetea este un proces de integrare a pierderii — o retragere care permite reflectia si vindecarea. Este semnalul ca ceva valoros lipseste.
description.en: Sadness is a process of integrating loss — a withdrawal that allows reflection and healing. It is the signal that something valuable is missing.

description.ro: Plictiseala semnaleaza ca mediul nu ofera suficienta stimulare pentru nevoile tale. Este un impuls spre cautarea sensului si noutatii.
description.en: Boredom signals that the environment doesn't offer enough stimulation for your needs. It is an impulse toward seeking meaning and novelty.

description.ro: Oboseala este semnalul corpului ca resursele sunt epuizate si este nevoie de recuperare. Este o invitatie la odihna si regenerare.
description.en: Tiredness is the body's signal that resources are depleted and recovery is needed. It is an invitation to rest and regenerate.

description.ro: Starea de deprimare este o retragere profunda — o scadere a energiei si motivatiei care semnaleaza ca ceva fundamental necesita atentie.
description.en: Depression is a deep withdrawal — a decrease in energy and motivation signaling that something fundamental needs attention.

description.ro: Singuratatea semnaleaza o nevoie fundamentala de conexiune umana. Este diferita de izolare — poti fi singur fara sa fii singuratic si singuratic intr-o multime.
description.en: Loneliness signals a fundamental need for human connection. It is different from solitude — you can be alone without being lonely and lonely in a crowd.

description.ro: Letargia este o lipsa profunda de energie — corpul si mintea se opresc ca un mecanism de protectie. Poate semnala suprasolicitare prelungita.
description.en: Lethargy is a profound lack of energy — body and mind shut down as a protection mechanism. It may signal prolonged overexertion.

description.ro: Starea sumbra este o umbrela de tristete pasiva — o perceptie ca lucrurile nu se vor imbunatati. Adesea precede o tranzitie sau o eliberare.
description.en: Gloominess is a passive umbrella of sadness — a perception that things won't improve. It often precedes a transition or release.
